description:
To prove their superiority over Earthlings, the frogs decide to form a soccer team, and go up against the best soccer players on Earth!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Akakichi no Keroro Shoutai de Arimasu / Tamama Yuujou no Shitto Shoot! de Arimasu
Keroro, champion du monde / Tamama et le tir jaloux de l`amitié
ケロロ 赤き血のケロロ小隊 であります / タママ 友情の嫉妬シュート! であります
